channel.title: motivation on knowledge base
channel.description: Recent content in motivation on knowledge base

item.title: Lin Dan vs Lee Chong Wei
item.description: Seeing them together, playing with such skills is so beautiful. Love their game. Great video compilation too

item.title: India's Maiden Indigenous Aircraft Carrier
item.description: It’s is good to see fellow country man are working are making things are aircraft carrier, weighing 40000 tonnes in itself looks like huge engineering and manufacturing feat.

item.title: Profiles to Look Upto
item.description: Time to time, few profiles come across to me, which I see and admire of, the amount of work they have done. The position they are in, the impact they are making. Seeing their profiles motivates me. These profile answer age old interview question for me: Where do you see youself in 3-5 years ? His readme is beautiful, simple and succint. His github is clean. Motivated me also collect those badges(certifications), never a certification guy, but those badges are looking cool.
